header.introduction: Hi, I’m Juan Carlos López Morales
header.summary: Experience in systems administration and full-stack web development using React, Tailwind CSS, PHP, Node.js and MySQL.

experience.description: Responsible for the installation, configuration and maintenance of clinical and administrative IT systems in a hospital environment. Managed Windows and Linux servers, handled user support, backups, network security and monitoring.

Leading development of an online fashion marketplace on WordPress with custom React components. Designed user registration, product catalog, URL-based product requests and cart system. Managed hosting deployment and CI/CD.

projects.name: Clouthy Marketplace
projects.description: A WordPress-based fashion marketplace I built as founder and CTO. Users can browse products, request items by URL, select size and quantity, and complete orders. Integrated custom React components for an interactive UX.

projects.name: Mar de Olivos Ceuta
projects.description: Developed the official website for Mar de Olivos restaurant in Ceuta. Implemented a mobile-first menu presentation with alternating image/description, reservation form and interactive guest messages.

projects.name: INGESA Hospital Inventory System
projects.description: Built a web-based inventory management system for INGESA’s hospital assets. Recreated an existing Access database schema in MySQL, developed a RESTful PHP backend running on Apache, and crafted a responsive HTML/CSS/JavaScript front end to allow staff to add, edit, search and report on medical equipment, consumables and software licenses.
